name: Horror tunnel
description:
You are confined in a weird world. You know that the only exit is entering  in the tunnel. But it's so dark, and there is a tiny monster that won't follow you,...  but it will be better do not  cross its way.

Controls:

Go forward: W or up arrow;

Go backward: S or down arrow;

Go left: A or left arrow;

Go right: D or right arrow;

Jump: Space or enter;

Switch lantern: F or L;

Toggle lock cursor: Escape or supr;

Pause the game: Control, alt, shift or tab;

Skip the start animation: T or P;

Note: The online version is only a demo and many features aren't available. Please as possible, use an offline version instead. Edge and Safari browsers won't work. The last online version is the 1.3, the newest versions don't work on the web.
